title: Chaplin's first films
brief_description: A selection of Chaplin’s early films illustrating the development of his art form from slapstick to a subtle mixture of pathos and comedy. Excerpts from the following are included in this compilation: “Some Nerve”, “Making a Living”, “Mabel’s Strange Predicament”, “Tillie’s Punctured Romance”, “His Prehistoric Past”, “The Champion” and “The Tramp”.
